## Method 3
```{r}
install.packages("installr")
library(installr)
installr::updateR()
```


```{r}
library(rvest)
url <- "https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/bitcoin/historical-data/"


read_html(url)

url %>% 
  read_html() %>% 
  html_node("table") %>% 
  html_table()

population <- url %>% 
  read_html() %>% 
  html_node("//*[@id="__next"]/div/div[1]/div[2]/div/div[3]/div/div/div[1]/div[2]/table")
```


### MEthood 4
```{r}
install.packages(RSelenium)

url<- "https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/bitcoin/historical-data/"

# RSelenium with Firefox
rD <- RSelenium::rsDriver(browser="chrome", port=4546L, verbose=F)
remDr <- rD[["client"]]
remDr$navigate(url)
Sys.sleep(4)

# get the page source
web <- remDr$getPageSource()
web <- xml2::read_html(web[[1]])

table <- html_table(web) %>%
  as.data.frame()

# close RSelenium
remDr$close()
gc()
rD$server$stop()
system("taskkill /im java.exe /f", intern=FALSE, ignore.stdout=FALSE)
```
